TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Csc extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler

Docs.summary: Implements the `Csc` task. Use the `Csc` element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [Csc Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void AddResponseFileCommands(class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine) cil managed

Docs.param: Command line builder to add arguments to.
Docs.summary: Fills the specified parameter with switches and other information that can go into a response file.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to compile code that uses the [unsafe](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) keyword.
Docs.value: if will compile code that uses the [unsafe](../Topic/unsafe%20\(C%23%20Reference\).md) keyword; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/unsafe (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Returns configuration information.
Gets or sets the preferred base address at which to load a DLL.
Docs.value: The preferred base address at which to load a DLL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default base address for a DLL is set by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] common language runtime. For more information, see [/baseaddress (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool CallHostObjectToExecute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Compiles the project through the host object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the `Csc` task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.
Docs.value: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether true if the `Csc` task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/checked (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the list of warnings to be disabled.
Docs.value: The list of warnings to be disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/nowarn (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the XML file to hold the documentation comments.
Docs.value: The XML file to hold the documentation comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/doc (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: If true, outputs the line and column of the end location of each error.
Gets or sets the method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.
Docs.value: The method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property can have a value of `prompt`, `send`, or `none`. If the property is set to `prompt`, you will receive a prompt when an internal compiler error occurs. The prompt lets you send a bug report electronically to Microsoft. If the property is set to `send`, a bug report is sent automatically. If the property is set to `none`, the error is reported only in the text output of the compiler. Default is `none`. For more information, see [/errorreport (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output () or to generate the name of the file in the compiler output ().
Docs.value: if the `Csc` task should generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output; if the `Csc` task should generate the name of the file in the compiler output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default is `false`. For more information, see [/fullpaths (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GenerateFullPathToTool() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the full file path of the Csc tool.
Docs.returns: The full file path of the Csc tool.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.HostObjectInitializationStatus InitializeHostObject() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.
Docs.returns: A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method will get called during execution of this task if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the version of the language to use.
Docs.value: The version of the language to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/langversion (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an assembly whose non-public types a .netmodule can access.
Docs.value: An assembly whose non-public types a .netmodule can access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/moduleassemblyname (C# Compiler Option)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the `Csc` task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll, which defines the entire System namespace.
Docs.value: if the `Csc` task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this property if you want to define or create your own System namespace and objects. For more information, see [/nostdlib (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the path of the .pdb file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/pdb (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: The name of the language passed to the “/preferreduilang” compiler option.
Docs.value: Returns the name of the language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If set to null, “/preferreduilang” is omitted and the compiler uses its default setting.

Docs.summary: Returns the name of the Csc tool (csc.exe).
Docs.value: The name of the Csc tool (csc.exe).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the `Csc` task should use the in-process compiler object, if available.
Docs.value: if the `Csc` task should use the in-process compiler object, if available; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the warning level for the compiler to display.
Docs.value: The warning level for the compiler to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/warn (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a list of warnings to treat as errors.
Docs.value: The list of warnings to treat as errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/warnaserror (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a list of warnings that are not treated as errors.
Docs.value: The list of warnings that are not treated as errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [/warnaserror (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
